Reviews.Title: “clean and cheap hotel”
Reviews.Author: danielabonaventura
Reviews.Content: very good hotel, cheap, clean, near to Tegel Airport , in 10 minutes you arrive to the centre of Berlin. good breakfast and large rooms

Reviews.Title: “Clean and very good value”
Reviews.Author: richy280983
Reviews.Content: I stayed here with my partner for 4 nights at the end of November and paid only £43 per night room only. The hotel is a 10 minute walk from Kurt-Schumacher Platz where the U-Bahn to central Berlin takes 15 minutes and the 128 bus to/from Tegel Airport around the same. There are also some shops and restaurants there but we overlooked them for the city centre. Breakfast can be paid for as and when you want it and costs 10 Euro per person. We never bothered with it so can't comment. The rooms are of a decent size, fairly modern and very clean. If you want luxury look elsewhere, but if all you need is a good value base for sightseeing then I would definately recommend this hotel. I would have preferred to stay in the city centre but for this price that would be impossible other than a hostel or low quality hotel. Any staff we dealt with were friendly and their English was good enough to get what we needed. Aircraft noise is barely audible when windows are closed and we stayed on the side facing the final approach to Berlin Tegel.

Reviews.Title: “Didn't keep reservation!”
Reviews.Author: Mike C
Reviews.Content: Once we arrived to the hotel, the staff tols us they didnt have any rooms left, even though our room was already paid for!!!! Don't stay here and risk it.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly, clean and excellent value”
Reviews.Author: kim p
Reviews.Content: Very friendly staff, clean and spacious room. Only a couple of minutes walk from the tube station, and 10 mins to the centre of Berlin. Taxi to Schoenefeldes Airport was under 50 euros. There's a large shopping centre along the main road that does a brilliant breakfast in one of its little cafes. Would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel - Location not great”
Reviews.Author: Shane0woking
Reviews.Content: Stayed here in June this year. States it is city centre but it's quite a trek. Easy from airport though, short bus rude plus a walk. Hard to find initially as it's out of the way. Planes can be loud but you get used to them.. Other than planes hotel was relatively quiet and room was nice. It's ok for a short trip but the main negative is the distance to the centre..

Reviews.Title: “Very Good”
Reviews.Author: Seansabazios
Reviews.Content: Hotel is in a very good location for Tegel Airport and is 10 minutes on the local underground from the city centre. The rooms were excellent for the price we payed and were cleaned daily. Service is good however some staff members English is very poor which is surprising for a hotel near the airport. Noise from Planes is minimal. Overall i would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “A good hotel in a convenient location”
Reviews.Author: baiyzet
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel from 26 to 29 May. Advantages of hotel: Location -near the airport Tegel (12 min by bas) -subway station U-Bash Kurt-Schumacher-Platz 5 minutes walk -to the center of Berlin 12-15 minutes by subway (Aleksander platz or Potsdamer platz) -near a large supermarket Kaufland, working on weekdays and 24.00 -nearby are several cafes and restaurants The rooms are clean and spacious enough. Soft and large beds, sleep just fine. Staff are friendly and always willing to help. We did not take breakfast because near shops and cafes. The rooms can be seen from the street sitting down aircraft, but this does not prevent but rather interestingly.

Reviews.Title: “As expected”
Reviews.Author: lonestar1988
Reviews.Content: For once we got what we had been showed in the pictures and at the price we got our room at that quite unexpected, so we were very pleased with the room - very nicely done up and more modern interior than most other hotels we've been to. The location wasn't amazing, the distance to the Kurt Scumacher U-bahn was okay and there were some nice restaurants in the area and of course the Kaufland market pretty much just across the street which will get you almost nything at almost any time. Our breakfast was not included and as we thought 10 euro for breakfast per person was a little too much we tried a few different places down the street but ended up in the Thürmann Bäckerei & Konditorei where we had breakfast for 2, very nice and of course cheaper :) The room was very clean and most of the staff were very attentive and complying. Of course this hotel is situated very close to the Tegel airport which means that planes are crossing over all the time, but it really didn't bother us, when the windows were closed we could hardly hear it. All in all, one of the better hotels we've visited :)

Reviews.Title: “Good price for me”
Reviews.Author: rob_sad
Reviews.Content: Hotel doesn't have good location for guests which want to explore the city and is not as close to the airport as should be, but is probably the cheapest. Hotel does not have good public transportation to the airport, your best option is a taxi, which luckily is going short. We slept here for only one night, just before departure on the early morning. Rooms are not large and rather modest.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, basic hotel close to Tegel airport”
Reviews.Author: DP2K
Reviews.Content: Stayed here on our last night of a short trip to Berlin. Hotel was clean, newly decorated and convenient to Tegel airport. Staff were helpful and had a pleasant stay. There is no A/C and rooms were very warm this time of year. Also, as we were unfamiliar with Tegel, we decided to stay close to the airport for an early morning flight. This isn't necessary though and there is better value in Berlin.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay, great price.”
Reviews.Author: Hekator
Reviews.Content: The service was nice and polite. The room was nicely decorated and clean. The bed was great. The location is near a metro station that will quickly take you to the city center. The room did not have air conditioning, but the weather was great so we did not need it. It was €45 for a double room per night w/o breakfast. Great price.

Reviews.Title: “Warm, Friendly and Welcoming - absolute bargain”
Reviews.Author: matty-os
Reviews.Content: At less than £30 a night I wasn't expecting the Ritz Carlton. However this hotel was great, Rooms were clean but basic, with new and fresh decor . (we had the roof rooms) bathrooms was small but clean and shower was great. Hotel is 5 min walk to kurt Schumacher on the u6 line. from there its 10 mins to the main areas. The airport is a 10 mins bus ride. I have heard people complain about the size of the rooms or the location. Yet to me this is foolish. Surely you cant expect a spacious and central room for the price offered by the hotel....I'd say the rooms were sized above average and the staff were very friendly and spoke superb english. I really could not fault this hotel, and i would suggest it to everyone young old etc

Reviews.Title: “Just what you'd expect”
Reviews.Author: Vannegen
Reviews.Content: We stayed there just one night, but the overall impression was positive: nice, clean, rather cosy, quite comfortable, though nothing overwhelming. In a side street near the Schumacher-Platz but rather easy to find through. Godd access to the city (U-Bahn, buses within 5 min. walk), immediate proximity to a big food shopping center and a number of restaurants. Recommendable.

HotelInfo.Name: Grand City Central Hotel Berlin Airport
HotelInfo.Address: Kogelstrasse 12-13, 13403 Berlin, Germany (Formerly Central-Hotel Reinickendorf)
